subject: Wrestling
Olympic Games (2008)
Mexican-Americans
Business Schools
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Mendoza Langowski is from Chicago. He is part Polish and part Mexican. His family owns an Italian gelato cafe. At the last Summer Olympics, he comprised the entire Mexican wrestling team.
